alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Grady; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Jefferson, northeastern Leon, southern Grady, Thomas and southwestern Brooks Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 1259 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Havana to 14 miles south of Thomasville to near Monticello. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Thomasville, Tallahassee, Boston, Pavo, Barwick, Alma, Dills, Thomasville Municipal A/P, Grooverville, Dillon, Everett, Rocky Hill, Miccosukee, Iamonia, Merrillville, Drifton, Casa Blanco, Pisgah Church and Lake Miccosukee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for Big Bend of Florida...and south central and southwestern Georgia.
